title: Pogačar Confirms COVID Infection, Roglič ‘Feeling No Pain,’ Vingegaard ‘Touch and Go,’ and Evenepoel Won’t Throw in GC Towel
content:
Tour de France favorites wrap up: Some of the race's top stars speak as the race start draws closer.

Read the full article at Pogačar Confirms COVID Infection, Roglič ‘Feeling No Pain,’ Vingegaard ‘Touch and Go,’ and Evenepoel Won’t Throw in GC Towel on Velo.
author: ahood
